mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company(cp_id, pwd, admin_name, admin_phone, cp_name, cp_num, cp_phone, fax_num, cp_address , cp_email) VALUES(#{cp_id}, #{pwd}, #{admin_name}, #{admin_phone}, #{cp_name}, #{cp_num}, #{cp_phone}, #{fax_num}, #{cp_address}, #{cp_email})
mapper.select: SELECT pwd FROM company WHERE cp_id = #{cp_id}
